document.full_text: british astrophysicist martin rees, whose research delves deep into the mysteries of the cosmos, has won the 2011 templeton prize for career achievements affirming life's spiritual dimension.
document.title: uk astrophysicist rees wins 2011 templeton prize
lines_and_colors: british astrophysicist martin rees, whose research delves deep into the mysteries of the cosmos, has won the 2011 templeton prize for career achievements affirming life's spiritual dimension.
